thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Top ratings, keep it up!
thread.title_full: Top ratings, keep it up! - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Iatsuliak A
title: Top ratings, keep it up!
text:
Stayed with Family during vacation.
Excellent location - a lot of sightseeings are reachable by walking.
Very clean and neat, new, modern hotel. Very few like this in the very center of Rome.
Breakfast was good. Friendly, helpful personnel.
Negatives: parking provided by Hotel is very expensive, we were using other parking lots located near train Station in 5 min walking distance, saving 10â‚¬ per day.
